name: Quack my Duck
description:
Get ready to go on an exciting adventure in search of pretty ducks in an amazing city! Find all the hidden ducks in this colorful game, and restore peace to the city.

Game Features:

A wide variety of different ducks to find
Unique art style
Simple yet memorable storyline

Good Duck!

trailer music:
Sneaky Snitch by Kevin MacLeod
